name: JH2
short_description:
A PHP/MySQL job board solution

Sorry folks ... I know it has been a long time since I have touched this project ...

Just an FYI of what I am thinking about doing:

1) Will use CodeIgniter as server side framework
2) Will use jQuery and jQuery UI for client side coding
3) Very AJAXy, and will try to treat server side code as pure web services, only streaming back JSON data
4) New functionality will be minimal, just catching up with the times in terms of development BP
5) Will try, TRY to validate server side coding with unit tests

This link will contain Google docs used to describe things such as services, etc.

https://docs.google.com/open?id=0B-qDbxqe45IaOTMzOTEyZmYtMGZjZC00NDNhLTg5NDktZGZmMWYxOWE1MGJi


Thanks,
Greg
